code: function createTime(timeToFormat){var hours=timeToFormat.getHours();var minutes=timeToFormat.getMinutes();var seconds=timeToFormat.getSeconds();var rawTimeArray=[hours,minutes,seconds];var timeArray=rawTimeArray.map(function(time){var timeString=time.toString();if(timeString.length===1){timeString="0"+timeString;}return timeString;});return"".concat(timeArray[0],":").concat(timeArray[1],":").concat(timeArray[2]);}export default createTime;
